alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:41PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 641 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hard Rock Stadium, or over Miami Gardens, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Davie, Miami Gardens, North Miami, North Miami Beach, Miami Lakes, Cooper City, Opa-Locka, West Park, Miami Springs, Miami Shores, El Portal, Medley, Gladeview, Westview and Royal Palm Ranches. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
